orench wethin parisara hithakami prawardhana wadasatahanak si. ef. el widuli bubulu bhawithaya prawardhanaya karana atharathurama ema widuli bubuluwalin siduwiya haki parisara haniya walakwa lima sandaha wana wishesha prawardhana wadasatahanak orench ilektirakals samagama wisin diyath karanu laba thibe. si. ef. el. widuli bubuluwala rasadiya adangu wana nisa pawichchiyen iwath kala pasu ema widuli bubulu nisi aakarayen parisarayen bahara kirima itha wadagathya.

indiyanu primiyar ligayata palaka mandalaye awasarayakin thorawa krida kirimata nohakiya.ada sangata muhuna dimata sidu wu wani thathwayak anagathayedi udgathawanu athayi bawata eda niladharin nosithuwe mandayi ma nodanimi.samaharawita owunta eetath eha giya rajakari thibuna wiya haka.mema thiranayath samaga owunata siduwi athi paduwa dolar 150000 pamana we.dan owunata ee paduwa dara gatha haka.mak nisada yath dan sanga krida karanne ape rata wenuwen nisaweni.
